intro: A fashion game where your unique, cute style comes to life!
description:
Enjoy the latest fashion trends in the third installment of the stylish Nintendo Switch™ game!
Become a new model, enjoy fashion, work, and sometimes romance, while aiming to become a top model!

◆Create your own cute model with trendy fashion items!
Dress up freely with trendy items approved by the popular fashion magazine "Nicola" for middle school students!
Combine them with trendy hair and makeup to enjoy being stylish just like in real life!

◆Experience the dream job of being a model!
Take on various jobs like magazines, TV shows, and fashion shows!
In magazine work, experience everything from putting together outfits based on themes, to photo shoots and article layouts!
Create the perfect article where your outfit shines the most!

◆Friendships and romance too! Your unique story of growth awaits!
Meet many unique model friends and boys!
Work together, go out together, and experience the glamorous life of a model!

◆Connect to the internet and share your model!
Show off your favorite model or enjoy a duo shoot with your friend's model!
